description.line1: >> Developed an interactive dashboard panel for Doctors, Patients, Nurses, Admin, and Pharmacists. They can perform different operations according to their responsibilities.
description.line2: >> Allowed users to posts, likes, comments, view all services, doctors' details, and get doctor appointments.
description.line3: >> We show some services, projects and reviews in our UI.
description.line4: >> Implemented a blood bank section from which anyone can get blood related information.
description.line5: >> For online payment we used SSL commerz, UUID method.
description.line7: >> For backend used Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB.

name: Creative Agency - Website Design and Development

description.line1: >> First of all, it is fully responsive website for mobile and desktop.
description.line2: >> We added some animation to make website beautiful.
description.line3: >> We show some services, projects and reviews in our UI.
description.line4: >> We create a different control panel for users and admin.
description.line5: >> For online payment we used SSL commerz, UUID method.
description.line7: >> For backend used Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB.

description.line1: >> Mainly I did this project with react.js.
description.line2: >> I used react-bootstrap for the design part.
description.line3: >> For routing purposes I used react-router-dom.
description.line4: >> All the data are stored in the MongoDB database.
description.line5: >> Firebase authentication is used for login purpose.
description.line6: >> There are some different functionality for general user and admin.
description.line7: >> I used redux for loading data.
description.line8: >> Full projects are fully responsive for mobile or desktop screen.
description.line9: >> Backend side are deployed on Heroku.
description.line10: >> Frontend side are deployed on firebase.

description.line3: >> Admin have ability to add products, update products and shipping status and create new admin

description.line1: >> Travel agency website with dynamic functions and responsive design.
